refnamediv.refpurpose: This function returns the last IMAP error (if any) that occurred during this page request

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns the full text of the last IMAP error message that occurred on the current page. The error stack is untouched; calling imap_last_error subsequently, with no intervening errors, will return the same error. Returns &false; if no error messages are available.
